alert.note: Alert for Greene; Lawrence; Martin (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 3:49PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Monroe, northeastern Martin, southeastern Greene and Lawrence Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 348 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northeast of Shoals, or 13 miles west of Bedford, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Monroe, northeastern Martin, southeastern Greene and Lawrence Counties, including the following locations... Williams, Avoca, Indian Springs, Oolitic, Silverville, Huron, Owensburg and Heltonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
